title: 28 Weeks Later
review: There's more cool zombie stuff than the first one, but less imaginative drama. It's so full of set pieces that it's exciting to watch all the way through, especially that helicopter bit. One thing I found distracting was thinking about how the pilot guy asked them to walk from Canary Wharf to Regents Park, and then to Wembley, in the same day. He was asking them to hurry like that isn't a total ordeal, especially when you're winding through streets and walking down Underground tunnels.
spoiler: I interpreted the ending as meaning the little boy transmitted the rage virus by kissing a French person on the lips. (Maybe as a way of saying hello; I don't know what kind of stuff they get up to over there.)
